chemicals_used: diethyl ester derivative of the proligand H4mpba (0.92 g, 3.0 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Large, pink, hexagonal prisms suitable for X-ray diffraction

chemicals_used: lithium salt of the dicobalt(II) precursor 1 (0.80 g, 0.5 mmol)
synthesis_conditions.time: immediate formation, air-dried for several hours
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The gelatinous precipitate formed immediately was collected on filter paper and air-dried to give a deep green solid after standing for several hours at room temperature.
